title: Spotify New Music Update 13.6.16
body:
Another big week for new music, with massive returns from MØ and Metronomy, beautiful tracks from Plasi, Lists and Michl, and slick pop from Jojee and Lostboycrow, alongside many others.

Check out the playlist below.
